website_summaries.verdict: Waterproof leather with a breathable lining makes this a great choice for tough terrain.
pros: We loved the cushioning and arch support, which helps avoid ankle strain on inclines
Good tread for hiking and long walks
Lightweight boots that look good on the feet
cons: Finding the right size proved tricky for some

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice hikers, sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice hikers, sturdy and well made. But they run about 1 whole size too small. Plus, i found the toe box rather narrow (But I do usually wear a wide). Luckily, my preteen daughter came along and snatched them up. They fit her perfectly, although on her skinny legs, they look a bit big on her! She doesn't seem to care, though.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMan53

customer_reviews.title: Boots look great, fit just as well
customer_reviews.text: Boots look great, fit just as well. I'm sure after breaking them in a bit, they'll be perfect. Feet don't necessarily sit flat like in some boots, but kind of in a "toes up" type of fit. I saw reviews that stated that the lace hooks at the top were flimsy and broke easily. I've not found that to be a problem. I feel secure walking on ice and in snow, quite unlike those uggly boots that have no tread.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price, ordered 1/2 size bigger as reviews said they run small, not true for me. Sturdy but slightly bulky
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte teachen

customer_reviews.title: I like the boots themselves
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots themselves, they're very cute, lots of cushion. They do rub quite a bit. I've been wearing tall socks and trying to break them in.The laces are incredibly short, but they can be replaced. Potentially order even two sizes bigger...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the Wolverine
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old hiker which began to leak and my socks would be wet. I am very happy with the Wolverine replacement

customer_reviews.title: the fit is perfect, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Awsome, the fit is perfect, light weight,good color. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: when I received my boots they looked great and fit comftable
customer_reviews.text: First time hiking boots buyer, and after reading reviews on these boots I purchased 1/2 bigger then my regular shoe size which is 7 1/2 ..when I received my boots they looked great and fit comftable...I used them for the first time on a 4 mile hike up San Bernardino national forest.. and I was happy breaking them in..I think they are ready for a longer hike! Love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: Nice hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice hiking boots! Still breaking them in but like the nylon shank versus other less flexible materials. It still gives the middle foot support and protection while walking over large rocks and won't feel it. Great boot for the price is paid. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: M. Boris

customer_reviews.title: I wear an 8- i ordered and 8 1/2 after ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8- i ordered and 8 1/2 after reading the ratings..these are still too small. and bulky and rubbed my ankles- returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I love these! So cute and keep me dry
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So cute and keep me dry. They don't feel heavy walking around either. Very comfortable for a long day
customer_reviews.author: jeffery smith

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was ok, felt a bit large but they looked good. Problem is top shoe lace clips are cheap plastic and one shoe arrived with a broken lace clip. I returned the shoes with the return label provided in the box, but have yet to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Babs101

customer_reviews.title: great for hiking in the wet forests of Oregon
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY from a name that only produces just that. waterproof too..great for hiking in the wet forests of Oregon. Love them, stylish and sturdy both. Fits to perfect for me. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: The fit is a little tight & I have a narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new pair of hiking boots b/c my old pair finally gave out. Had them for over 20 years. What a great product & their made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: marlene henslee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but were too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but were too small. Usually 8.5 should have got nines. The ankle part was also much bulkier than I wanted (really thick padding). They seem very nicely constructed though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were really great boots, but the size 10 was not big ...
customer_reviews.text: These were really great boots, but the size 10 was not big enough and they did not have these in an 11 - i purchased the other pair that is a suede leather in an 11 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots. Ordered a size larger, good thing I did, they run small.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Way to short
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6.5. I ordered a 7 to be safe. My toes hit the front of the boot with tight light socks on.
customer_reviews.author: lori jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were very comfortable and the boots work great for my daughter hunting. Kept her feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great fit and a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, my husband and I both have a pair of Wolverine boots and we both love them.
customer_reviews.author: Katy M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good quality even is bulky look on my foot.but its a good hiking boats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: LIke the shoe but really close fit, wish it came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Barb E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice looking boots but they do run small.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok, but too small for my right foot. over all durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: ... got it in the mail it came in fast happy about that
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in the mail it came in fast happy about that. I am a size 71/2 so order a 8 fits good Can't wait to take it on a hike tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1/2 size up for a hiking trip, the shoes were wonderful and didn't hurt my feet after 4 days of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Panova

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the sale price. Runs small.  Low boot.
customer_reviews.text: I hike three days a week for 3-7 miles each time. They are comfortable but I would order at least a half size up. They are lightweight and immediately wearable. Comfortable inside. These are what I would call a mid hiker and really do not support your entire ankle. I would get something a little bit nicer next time for the extra money. Update: The teed wore off super fast and they don't have any grip Left, and after 10 months they are not waterproof anymore. At all. I had 1 pair of vasque and they lasted 15 years so that's a little disappointing, understanding that they were much more expensive. At this rate I'll End up spending more anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kait R.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift and was told it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Public Service

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I could hike anything
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I could hike anything, these boots made my feet feel safe. A little bulky and tight for my taste but they offered the support that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for cold weather hiking.
customer_reviews.text: These feel more like a winter boot than a hiking boot to me. They are comfortable and arch support feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Size runs small and eve though i ordered 1/2 larger. but I love the. They are very comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Robinlynnski

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but the fit is smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my girlfriend a couple of days ago, but they ran quit small. she usually wears a US 6, but for these, we have to go a half or one full size bigger. However, I can say for sure that they look very durable and tough. They are light weighted and comfortable and perfect for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Kiavash

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Love the fact that they are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Love the fact that they are waterproof! But I bought a pair in same size as all my other shoes and they were so uncomfortable. I had to go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great! No break in period & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! No break in period & lightweight. This is the second pair of Wolverines I have had. I do a lot of snow shoveling & also use them in mud. Waterproof and warm. Buy them you won't be sorry. Advice from me is to buy a half size bigger than your normal shoe size as they run slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: linda sletzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with My Purchase, These Boots are Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: tina talaga

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes & comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and very comfy. Haven't hiked much but am sure these will be great
customer_reviews.author: MT Egan

product_meta.title: Wolverine Women's Blackledge LX Waterproof Mid Ankle Hiker
product_meta.description: Established in Rockford, Michigan in 1883, Wolverine is an iconic American brand that combines superior materials with timeless craftsmanship. Wolverine boots are built to withstand the toughest of environments and provide all day comfort. Today, Wolverine leads the industry with a relentless commitment to innovation and patented technologies including Wolverine Contour Welt, Wolverine MultiShox, Wolverine Durashocks, Wolverine DuraShocks SR and Wolverine Fusion.
feature_bullets: Compression molded ethylene vinyl acetate footbed and midsole
Light flex with no break in required
